title: Universal Relationship
description:
Kal continues his "Why are you a Universalist?" series, interviewing those who identify as Universalists.  Here he talks with Nate Hile (pictured with his sister and grandfather in the thumbnail), who explains why his grandfather is the reason he's a Universalist.

Check out this discussion and more from Kal on his podcast 
Universalism Against the World - https://open.spotify.com/show/3d4QlAnRwp51f9psDU04xh
